data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Amritsar that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Amritsar, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Amritsar, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 27,398 believers in Amritsar to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,463,302 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Amritsar prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Mahtam (Sikh traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Amritsar, Punjab, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Amritsar to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Amritsar, Punjab, India has a population of 2,490,700.

We estimate Amritsar has 27,398 people who might know Jesus, 30,220 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,433,082 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: There are 2,490,700 people living in the county of Amritsar. Only about 27,398 might be believers.
